text: When in Rome is a 2010 romantic comedy. It stars Kristen Bell, Josh Duhamel, Will Arnett, Anjelica Huston, Shaquille O'Neal and Danny DeVito. The comedy is about back and forth romances. It got bad reviews from critics. It got $43 million in worldwide revenue. Category:2010 romantic comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Steven Johnson Category:Screenplays by Mark Steven Johnson Category:Movies set in Rome
title: When in Rome
